description:
A customized version of the Gundam Ez8 from "MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM: THE 08th MS TEAM." It is used by Ishibashi, a member of the Science Club at the Seiren Metropolitan Technical College. Both its arms are equipped with electromagnetic knuckles. Together with the Eliminator and Shadow Phantom, it forms a team whose three members divide up their roles and crush their enemies with flawless teamwork.
Source: Official Website
name: Ez-SR Intruder
